MedicationRequestActivitySP

Parameter activity:reference

Liefert alle referenzierten eML MedicationStatement Aktivitäten

ResourceMedicationRequest
ExpressionResource.extension('https://gematik.de/fhir/epa-medication/StructureDefinition/emp-medicationrequest-activity-extension').extension('reference').value
Target ResourcesMedicationStatement
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: The parameter may only appear once
  • multipleOr: The parameter may only have one value (no comma separators)

name: MedicationRequestActivitySP
description: Liefert alle referenzierten eML MedicationStatement Aktivitäten
